data.title: Congratulations to the Winners of the 7th Annual Vivian Awards!
data.meta_description: And the Vivian goes to... data.text:
And the Vivian goes to…

On-stage:

OUTSTANDING LEAD ACTOR IN A COMEDY/DRAMA

Dehron Foster – Ken Gorman – Rumors

OUTSTANDING LEAD ACTRESS IN A COMEDY/DRAMA

Michelle Volpe Roe – Chris Gorman – Rumors

OUTSTANDING SUPPORTING ACTOR IN A COMEDY/DRAMA

Joel Miller – Ernie Cusack – Rumors

OUTSTANDING SUPPORTING ACTRESS IN A COMEDY/DRAMA

Stephanie Larragoite – Cookie Cusack – Rumors

OUTSTANDING ALT DEBUT PERFORMANCE IN A COMEDY/DRAMA

Ronda Lewis – Margot Wendice – Dial M For Murder

OUTSTANDING LEAD ACTOR IN A MUSICAL

David Bello – Don Lockwood – Singin’ In The Rain

OUTSTANDING LEAD ACTRESS IN A MUSICAL

Lisette Mowery – Lina Lamont – Singin’ In The Rain

OUTSTANDING SUPPORTING ACTOR IN A MUSICAL

Nicholas Laemmer – Lord Farquaad – Shrek The Musical

OUTSTANDING SUPPORTING ACTRESS IN A MUSICAL

Laura Nuzum – Dragon/Mama Ogre – Shrek The Musical

OUTSTANDING ALT DEBUT IN A MUSICAL

Jordon Embree – Cosmo Brown – Singin’ In The Rain

OUTSTANDING PERFORMANCE BY A YOUTH

Sofia Schwall – Young Princess Fiona – Shrek The Musical

OUTSTANDING SILVER PLAYER

Keith Druyor

Backstage:

LIGHTS OR SOUND OPERATOR

Jerry Hines

OUTSTANDING STAGE MANAGER

Dona Marie Barra

PROPS DESINGER

Michael Nuckols

DECK CHIEF

Samantha Seaman

RUNNING CREW

Kaleah Baca

COSTUME RUNNING CREW

Robert Johnson

COSTUME VOLUNTEER

Emma Zeigler

OUTSTANDING ALT NEWCOMER

Amy Mershawn

Front of house:

OUTSTANDING NEW AMBASSADOR

Rachel Conine

OUTSTANDING VETERAN AMBASSADOR

Rebecca Dyble

OUTSTANDING TEAM AMBASSADORS

John & Marie Henfling

OUTSTANDING OVERALL AMBASSADOR

Royce Saxon

The Vivian Awards is a private, volunteer appreciation ceremony for the backbone and heart of Albuquerque Little Theatre, our amazing volunteers.

If you are a winner mentioned above and you were unable to attend the Vivians, please contact the Box Office (505-242-4750 x2) to schedule a time to pick up your award.

The Vivian Awards are named after the late Vivian Vance, who began her acting career on the Albuquerque Little Theatre Stage. Below you can see the one of a kind portrait that was donated by Vivians family to the theatre . You can view the actual portrait in the ALT lobby, along with her Emmy Award and other accolades.

Vivian Vance was an American television and theater actress and singer. Vance is best known for her role as Ethel Mertz, sidekick to Lucille Ball on the American television sitcom I Love Lucy, and as Vivian Bagley on The Lucy Show.
